mapper.insert: insert into MATEAPPLY(ANO, ASTATUS, ADATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO) values (MATECOMMUNITY_SEQ.nextval, 'WAITING', sysdate, #{memberNo}, #{mCommunityNo})
mapper.select: select ANO, ASTATUS, ADATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO, TITLE, ASSEMBLETIME, r from (select ANO, ASTATUS, ADATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO, TITLE, ASSEMBLETIME, rownum AS r from (select ma.ANO, ma.ASTATUS, ma.ADATE, ma.MEMBERNO, mc.MCOMMUNITYNO, mc.TITLE, mc.ASSEMBLETIME from MATEAPPLY ma, MATECOMMUNITY mc where ma.MEMBERNO = #{memberNo} AND ma.MCOMMUNITYNO = mc.MCOMMUNITYNO order by ANO) ) where r >= #{start_num} and r <= #{end_num}

select ANO, ASTATUS, ADATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO, NAME, r from (select ANO, ASTATUS, ADATE, MEMBERNO, MCOMMUNITYNO, NAME, rownum AS r from (select ma.ANO, ma.ASTATUS, ma.ADATE, ma.MEMBERNO, ma.MCOMMUNITYNO, m.NAME from MATEAPPLY ma, MEMBER m where ma.MCOMMUNITYNO = #{mCommunityNo} AND ma.MEMBERNO = m.MEMBERNO order by ANO) ) where r >= #{start_num} and r <= #{end_num}
mapper.update: update MATEAPPLY set ASTATUS = 'DENIED' where MCOMMUNITYNO = #{mCommunityNo} and ASTATUS = 'WAITING'
